snippet: Faced with steadily declining sales, Olive Garden announced plans to capitalize on perhaps its most popular menu item: breadsticks.
abstract: Olive Garden says it will begin using type of breadsticks for sandwiches, move prompted by declining sales; breadsticks, which are chain's most popular menu items, were center of 2014 dispute between investor Starboard Value and chain owner Darden Restaurants, after which Starboard won bid to take control of board.
lead_paragraph: Faced with steadily declining sales, Olive Garden announced plans to capitalize on perhaps its most popular menu item: breadsticks.

headline.main: Olive Garden Breadsticks to Debut in Lunch Sandwiches
headline.print_headline: Olive Garden Breadsticks to Debut in Lunch Sandwiches
